net.mmarss.grease.geom2d

Class Rect

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.mmarss.grease.geom2d.Rect

  • public class Rect
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an axis-aligned two-dimensional rectangle. This class is immutable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rect(float x0, float y0, float x1, float y1)
      Constructs a new axis-aligned rectangle between the points (x0, y0) and (x1, y1).
      Rect(Point corner0, Point corner1)
      Constructs a new axis-aligned rectangle between the specified points.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getHeight() 
      float getMaxX() 
      float getMaxY() 
      float getMinX() 
      float getMinY() 
      float getWidth() 
      boolean intersects(Circle other)
      Tests whether this axis-aligned rectangle intersects the given circle.
      boolean intersects(Rect other)
      Tests whether this axis-aligned rectangle intersects the given rectangle.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rect

        public Rect(Point corner0,
            Point corner1)
        Constructs a new axis-aligned rectangle between the specified points. These points do not need to be in any particular order.
        Parameters:
        corner0 - the first corner of the rectangle, diagonally opposite the second.
        corner1 - the second corner of the rectangle, diagonally opposite the first.

      • Rect

        public Rect(float x0,
            float y0,
            float x1,
            float y1)
        Constructs a new axis-aligned rectangle between the points (x0, y0) and (x1, y1). These points do not need to be in any particular order.
        Parameters:
        x0 - the x-coordinate of the first corner of the rectangle.
        y0 - the y-coordinate of the first corner of the rectangle.
        x1 - the x-coordinate of the second corner of the rectangle.
        y1 - the y-coordinate of the second corner of the rectangle.

    • Method Detail

      • getMinX

        public float getMinX()
        Returns:
        the lower x-axis bound of this rectangle.

      • getMinY

        public float getMinY()
        Returns:
        the lower y-axis bound of this rectangle.

      • getMaxX

        public float getMaxX()
        Returns:
        the upper x-axis bound of this rectangle.

      • getMaxY

        public float getMaxY()
        Returns:
        the upper y-axis bound of this rectangle.

      • getWidth

        public float getWidth()
        Returns:
        this rectangle's width; the x-axis span of this rectangle.

      • getHeight

        public float getHeight()
        Returns:
        this rectangle's height; the y-axis span of this rectangle.

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Rect other)
        Tests whether this axis-aligned rectangle intersects the given rectangle.
        Parameters:
        other - the rectangle to test intersection with.
        Returns:
        true if this rectangle intersects the given rectangle, or false if not.

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Circle other)
        Tests whether this axis-aligned rectangle intersects the given circle.
        Parameters:
        other - the circle to test intersection with.
        Returns:
        true if this rectangle intersects the given circle, or false if not.
